solver

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.Solver

  • public class Solver
extends java.lang.Object
    A Breadth First maze solving class, adapted for use with KivaWorld.

    Given a solver.Maze() object, solves the map from starting location to pod location to drop zone location, or from start to end if there is no pod in the map.

    See Also:
    Maze
